title: Domain 4.3: Given a scenario, implement workstation backup and recovery methods.
content:
🧯 Backup and Recovery Types

  • Full: 📦 Backs up everything. Most time-consuming, but easiest to restore.
  • Incremental: ➕ Only backs up what changed since the last backup of any kind. Fast backups, slower restore.
  • Differential: 📘 Backs up changes since the last full backup. Grows larger over time, but faster to restore than incremental.
  • Synthetic: 🧬 Combines full and incremental into a virtual full backup without re-copying data. Efficient and storage-friendly.

🧪 Backup Testing

  • Frequency: ⏱️ Regularly test backups to ensure they’re valid and restorable.

🔁 Backup Rotation Schemes

  • On Site vs. Off Site: 🏢 vs. ☁️ — Keep one local for fast recovery, one remote for disaster protection.
  • Grandfather-Father-Son (GFS): 👴 👨 👦 — Son = daily, Father = weekly, Grandfather = monthly.
  • 3-2-1 Backup Rule: 📂 3 total copies, 💽 2 local on different devices, ☁️ 1 off-site copy.
